争議行為: (そうぎこうい) - direct action; strike
事: (koto) - () - coisa abstrata, coisa, assunto; incidente, ocorrência, evento, algo sério, problema, crise; circunstâncias, situação, estado de coisas; trabalho, negócio, assunto
事々しい: (ことごとしい) - bombastic; pretentious; exaggerated
事々物々: (じじぶつぶつ) - (yoji) everything; every affair (matter); all things
事あるごとに: (ことあるごとに) - at every opportunity; for each and every thing that crops up; with every little thing; whenever possible; whenever the chance arises; at every turn
事ある毎に: (ことあるごとに) - at every opportunity; for each and every thing that crops up; with every little thing; whenever possible; whenever the chance arises; at every turn
事あれかし: (ことあれかし) - any time now (waiting, hoping for something to happen)
事える: (つかえる) - to serve; to work for; to attend
事がある: (ことがある) - (after the past tense form of a verb) (something) has occurred/to have done (something)/such a thing happened; (something) happens on occasions/there are times when
事ができる: (ことができる) - can (do); to be able to (do); can be done; is able to be done
事がら: (ことがら) - matter; thing; affair; circumstance
事が出来る: (ことができる) - can (do); to be able to (do); can be done; is able to be done
事が無い: (ことがない) - (after the past tense form of a verb) (something) has never occurred/to have never done (something)/such a thing has not happened; never happens/there is never a time when
事が足りる: (ことがたりる) - to be sufficient; to answer the purpose
事ここに至る: (ことここにいたる) - to reach a situation about which nothing can be done
事こそ: (ことこそ) - this for sure; certainly is
事とする: (こととする) - to devote oneself/to do one thing exclusively/to make a job of; to decide to
事と成る: (こととなる) - it has been decided (so) that; it has been arranged (so) that
事と次第で: (こととしだいで) - if things permit; under certain circumstances
事なかれ主義: (ことなかれしゅぎ) - (principle of) letting sleeping dogs lie; peace-at-any-price; don't rock the boat
事なきを得る: (ことなきをえる) - to survive without problems; to manage to avoid further problems
事にする: (ことにする) - to decide to; (after the past tense form of a verb) to pretend that; (as 〜ことにしている) to make a practice of doing/to make it a rule to
事にすると: (ことにすると) - perhaps; maybe; possibly
事になりかねない: (ことになりかねない) - it could turn out badly; it might have unfortunate consequences
事になる: (ことになる) - (usu. sentence ending) it has been decided (so) that/it has been arranged (so) that; it is the result (of)/it is the outcome; it is the reason (for)
事によって: (ことによって) - via; through; by doing; by means of; using
事により: (ことにより) - by (means of); by doing; due to; via; through
事による: (ことによる) - depending on the circumstances; due to (with modifying verb)
事によると: (ことによると) - possibly; maybe; perhaps
事のついで: (ことのついで) - take the opportunity to (do something else)
事の序で: (ことのついで) - take the opportunity to (do something else)
事の起こり: (ことのおこり) - how it came about; how it originated; how it happened; the origins of the imbroglio
事はない: (ことはない) - there is no need to ...; never happens/there is never a time when
事は無い: (ことはない) - there is no need to ...; never happens/there is never a time when
事ほどさように: (ことほどさように) - so ... that ...; to that extent; to that degree
事ほど左様に: (ことほどさように) - so ... that ...; to that extent; to that degree
事もあろうに: (こともあろうに) - of all things (days, etc.)
事を分ける: (ことをわける) - to reason with (a person)
事を好む: (ことをこのむ) - to revel in trouble and discord; to be bent on making trouble; to like starting fights
事を構える: (ことをかまえる) - to take an aggressive position; to stir up trouble
事を起こす: (ことをおこす) - to cause trouble (a disturbance)
事を運ぶ: (ことをはこぶ) - to go ahead; to proceed; to carry on
事事しい: (ことごとしい) - bombastic; pretentious; exaggerated
事事物物: (じじぶつぶつ) - (yoji) everything; every affair (matter); all things
事件: (jiken) - evento, caso, incidente, caso, trama, problema, escândalo
事件の綾: (じけんのあや) - web of the case
事件屋: (じけんや) - fixer; dispute resolution specialist
事件解決: (じけんかいけつ) - resolution of an incident; solution to a (criminal) case
事体: (じたい) - (often with a negative connotation) situation; (present) state of affairs; circumstances
事例研究: (じれいけんきゅう) - case studies
事例研究法: (じれいけんきゅうほう) - case method; case study method
事例紹介: (じれいしょうかい) - showcasing examples (e.g. company products); case study
事例集: (じれいしゅう) - collection of cases; collection of instances
事切れる: (こときれる) - to expire; to die
事前: (じぜん) - prior; beforehand; in advance; before the fact; ex ante
事前予約不要: (じぜんよやくふよう) - advance reservations not required
事前予約要: (じぜんよやくよう) - advance reservation required
事前審査: (じぜんしんさ) - advance screening; prior inspection; preliminary review; pre-vetting
事前工作: (じぜんこうさく) - (yoji) preparatory operations; measure taken in advance; doing the groundwork
事前従犯: (じぜんじゅうはん) - accessory before the fact
事前従犯人: (じぜんじゅうはんにん) - accessory before the fact
事前研修: (じぜんけんしゅう) - advance training; prior training
事前記録データ媒体: (じぜんきろくデータばいたい) - recorded data medium
事前記録媒体: (じぜんきろくばいたい) - recorded (data) medium
事前購入: (じぜんこうにゅう) - advance purchase (e.g. fare)
事前購入割引運賃: (じぜんこうにゅうわりびきうんちん) - advance purchase excursion fare; APEX fare
事前通報: (じぜんつうほう) - advance report; advance notification
事務: (jimu) - trabalho de escritório, trabalho clerical, administração, negócios, assuntos
事務を執る: (じむをとる) - to do (attend to) business
事務を見る: (じむをみる) - to attend to business
